  • java.lang.Object

    public class VirtualFileManager<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFileManager<T>, IEventManager

      • read

        public boolean read()
        Description copied from interface: IFileManager
        Loads the content from the local file and stores it in the local object. To update the persistent and variable object, IFileManager.override() must be called.
        Specified by:
        read in interface IFileManager<T>
        Returns:
        true if successful read, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        IFileManager.override()

        Description copied from interface: IFileManager

        Specified by:

        Returns:
